+++ INGREDIENTS

  * (2 TbSpn)   Veggie Broth

  * (.25 cup)   Lemon Juice

  * (1/2 TsPn)  Salt
  * (?)         Black Pepper
  
+++ DIRECTIONS

  * 1) Soak cashews or boil for 30 mins
  * 2) Blend all ingredients
  * 3) Cook
